TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON GPE , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE in LOC . ORG were represented by Mr P. Laptev , Representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant lived in the town of GPE in GPE which had been affected by the GPE nuclear plant disaster . In DATE he decided to move to the village of ORG and sought a resettlement allowance . On DATE the Zlynkovskiy District Court of the Bryansk Region ordered the town council to pay the applicant MONEY ( RUR ) . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment . On an unspecified date the applicant submitted his writ of execution to ORG .

As the judgment of DATE remained without enforcement , the applicant brought a civil action for compensation for the depreciation of the award . On DATE the Zlynkovskiy ORG awarded the applicant ORG as compensation for the continued non - enforcement of the judgment in the period up to DATE . These monies were paid to the applicant on DATE .
In the meantime , on DATE the principal debt under the judgment of DATE was paid to the applicant .
On DATE the Zlynkovskiy ORG awarded a further compensation of ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL . It appears that the applicant received it in DATE .
